sentences.en: A garden is, at best, a holding operation against nature.
sentences.cn: 花园充其量不过是抗拒自然的一时之法。

sentences.en: Careful checks must be made before the factory commences operation.
sentences.cn: 工厂开始运营之前必须进行仔细检查。

sentences.en: Charles was at the clinic recovering from an operation on his arm.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯在诊所，进行手臂的术后恢复。

sentences.en: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation.
sentences.cn: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

sentences.en: He had a minor operation to remove a cyst.
sentences.cn: 他做了个切除囊肿的小手术。

sentences.en: Her lack of co-operation is nothing new, I regret to say.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我不得不说她缺少合作精神不是什么新鲜事。

sentences.en: It is hard to fault the way he runs his own operation.
sentences.cn: 他经营自己公司的方式无可指摘。

sentences.en: Many small businesses fail in the first year of operation.
sentences.cn: 许多小企业在经营的第一年就倒闭了。

sentences.en: My office is the nerve centre of the operation.
sentences.cn: 我的办公室是此次行动的控制中心。

sentences.en: She hated hospitals and didn't like the idea of having an operation.
sentences.cn: 她讨厌医院，也不想做手术。

sentences.en: She spent the night in intensive care after the operation.
sentences.cn: 手术后的那个夜晚她在重症监护病房度过。

sentences.en: She was released from prison in a cloak and dagger operation yesterday.
sentences.cn: 在昨天的一次秘密行动中她从监狱获释。

sentences.en: She’s going to need an operation on her ankle.
sentences.cn: 她需要接受脚踝手术。

sentences.en: The air rescue operation has now been scaled down.
sentences.cn: 空中救援行动的规模现在已经有所缩小。

sentences.en: The aircraft’s engine operation was normal.
sentences.cn: 飞机引擎运转正常。

sentences.en: The device has a single button, allowing for easy operation.
sentences.cn: 这个装置只有一个按钮，操作简便。

sentences.en: The doctor was prepared to do the operation for a large sum.
sentences.cn: 医生做这个手术需要收取高额费用。

sentences.en: The Financial Services Act came into operation four years ago.
sentences.cn: 《金融服务法》于4年前开始实施。

sentences.en: The firm set up its own property development operation.
sentences.cn: 这家商行成立了自己的房地产开发公司。

sentences.en: The formalization of co-operation between the republics would produce progress.
sentences.cn: 正式确立合作关系将会促进共和国之间合作的顺利进展。

sentences.en: The new investment system came into operation in 1999.
sentences.cn: 这套新的投资系统于1999年开始运作。

sentences.en: The operation has given me a new lease of life.
sentences.cn: 手术使我重获新生。

sentences.en: The operation is carried out under a general anaesthetic.
sentences.cn: 该手术是在全身麻醉情况下实施的。

sentences.en: The UN rescue operation started shortly after dawn.
sentences.cn: 联合国的救援行动在破晓后不久就开始了。

sentences.en: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.cn: 全部运算在三秒内完成。
